languages.text: {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, и вы чувствуете подступающий к горлу ком.{/n} "Я... учту ваше замечание".
{n}Cassia looks away, and you feel a lump rise in your throat.{/n} "I... will take your comment into consideration."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, и вы чувствуете подступающий к горлу ком.{/n} "Я... учту ваше замечание".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia looks away, and you feel a lump forming in your throat.{/n} "I... will take your comment into consideration."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia se détourne et vous sentez une boule se former dans votre gorge.{/n} « Je... prendrai votre avis en considération. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away, and you feel a lump rise in your throat.{/n} "I... will take your comment into consideration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se détourne et vous sentez une boule se former dans votre gorge.{/n} « Je... prendrai votre avis en considération. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia aparta la mirada y sientes un nudo en la garganta.{/n} «... Tendré en cuenta su comentario».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away, and you feel a lump rise in your throat.{/n} "I... will take your comment into consideration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia aparta la mirada y sientes un nudo en la garganta.{/n} «... Tendré en cuenta su comentario».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅移开了目光，你感觉喉咙仿佛肿起来了一样。{/n}“我……我会考虑你的意见的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away, and you feel a lump rise in your throat.{/n} "I... will take your comment into consideration."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅移开了目光，你感觉喉咙仿佛肿起来了一样。{/n}“我……我会考虑你的意见的。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは目をそらし、あなたは喉の中に何かを感じた。{/n}「私は…あなたの発言について、考えておきます」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away, and you feel a lump rise in your throat.{/n} "I... will take your comment into consideration."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは目をそらし、あなたは喉の中に何かを感じた。{/n}「私は…あなたの発言について、考えておきます」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia blickt weg und du spürst plötzlich einen Knoten in deinem Hals.{/n} "Ich ... werde über Eure Bemerkung nachdenken."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away, and you feel a lump rise in your throat.{/n} "I... will take your comment into consideration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia blickt weg und du spürst plötzlich einen Knoten in deinem Hals.{/n} "Ich ... werde über Eure Bemerkung nachdenken."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia gözlerini kaçırıyor. Boğazının düğümlendiğini hissediyorsun.{/n} "Ben... Yorumunu değerlendireceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks away, and you feel a lump rise in your throat.{/n} "I... will take your comment into consideration."
